name: Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten
description:
Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten is a RPG-strategy game developed by Nippon Ichi Software. It was originally released in 2011. NIS America published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten is available on PlayStation 3.
Sohei Niikawa produced the game. It was directed by Masahiro Yamamoto. Tenpei Sato scored the game.
